description: Got a green thumb and feel like you have #alltheplants already? Our Quarterly Unique & Special Plant Subscription will be a delight whether you are already a plant enthusiast or just starting your plant collection and want what no one else has. Subscribers receive a "hidden gem" plant in a 6” diameter grow pot delivered to their door every quarter. This subscription is made for someone who likes to be a little different, a houseplant pro that’s looking to continue to grow, or someone who just loves surprises and trying new things!
data.title: Quarterly Rare & Special Plant Subscription
